TitleEnglish: SHIROHIYO - Reincarnated as a Neglected Noble: Raising My Baby Brother With Memories From My Past Life
SummaryEnglish: Ageha Kikunoi was a spoiled 5-year-old before he suddenly recalled memories from a past life. Then, he loved to cook, sew, and sing above all else. In this world, Ageha and his younger brother, Regulus, try to navigate the Kikunoi house as corruption among the aristocracy deepens. They’ll need skills from Ageha’s past life, blessings of gods and elves, and magic spells to help them on their way!
Aliases: SHIROHIYO - Reincarnated as a Neglected Noble
Shiroi Buta Kizoku desu ga Zense no Kioku ga Haeta no de Hiyoko na Otōto Sodatemasu
Shirobuta Kizoku datta Doushiyoumonai Watashi ni Zense no Kioku ga Haeta Ken
Shiroi Buta Kizoku desu ga Zense no Kioku ga Haeta no de Hiyoko na Otouto Sodatemasu
Hakuton Kizoku desu ga Zense no Kioku ga Haeta node Hiyoko na Otouto Sodatemasu
I’m the White Pig Nobleman, but With the Memories of My Previous Life, I’ll Raise My Little Brother
Hakuton Kizoku desu ga Zense no Kioku ga Haeta node Hiyoko na Otōto Sodatemasu
Shirobuta Kizoku desu ga Zense no Kioku ga Haeta node Hiyoko na Otōto Sodatemasu
白豚貴族だったどうしようもない私に前世の記憶が生えた件
白豚貴族ですが前世の記憶が生えたのでひよこな弟育てます
Reincarnated as a Neglected Noble: Raising My Baby Brother With Memories From My Past Life
Shirobuta Kizoku desu ga Zense no Kioku ga Haeta node Hiyoko na Otouto Sodatemasu
I'm a White Pig of an Aristocrat, but I Developed Memories of My Previous Life, So I'm Raising My Younger Brother to Be Like a Small Chick

1.TitleEnglish: I Got My Memories From My Past Life Back!
1.SummaryEnglish: A Japanese man who likes cooking and sewing is reborn as a chubby noble child.

2.TitleEnglish: My First Time Meeting My Brother
2.SummaryEnglish: Ageha meets his young brother Regulus for the first time, and learns about his family.

3.SummaryEnglish: Ageha is forced to confront his family's ugliness.

4.TitleEnglish: I Made Origami for My Brother, and Chawan-Mushi for Me
4.SummaryEnglish: Ageha makes him and his brother special things that remind him of his old home.

5.TitleEnglish: I Don't Think I'm Going to Live a Long Life
5.SummaryEnglish: Ageha tries to think of ways he can help foster Regulus's education.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ageha takes a trip into town for the first time.

7.TitleEnglish: Using Magic to Visit the Capital
7.SummaryEnglish: Ageha takes a trip to the capital and meets two musicians.

8.TitleEnglish: H-Hello! It's an Honor to Meet You!
8.SummaryEnglish: Ageha meets another god, one who has a lot to say to him.

9.TitleEnglish: The Greatest Singer in the Empire Is Born!
9.SummaryEnglish: Ageha goes to see Maria's performance in the capital.

10.TitleEnglish: My Heart Is Full of Teachings and Sincerity
10.SummaryEnglish: Ageha's family is concerned about his well-being and would like him to enjoy his childhood more.

11.SummaryEnglish: Ageha makes his first friend in his new life.

12.TitleEnglish: I'll Use My Memories from a Past Life to Make a Business Deal
12.SummaryEnglish: Ageha comes up with a big plan to bring prosperity to the Kikunoi lands.
